About.introduction: I'm Milena Sol Aron, a Software Developer from Argentina. I have been working in this field since June 2023.
About.website: This website serves as a place to showcase my projects, skills and experience, but also to share my thoughts and pictures.
About.carrerait: My passion for the field led me to create and develop CarreraIT, a platform for people from Hispanic countries who want to work in tech or who already do. It provides surveys, free resources and orientation guides.

Resume.about-1: I’m a Software and Web Developer with over a year of work experience in the field.
Resume.about-2: Besides coding, I’ve been using GNU/Linux as my operating system since 2015, which gives me a solid understanding and experience in that area. At the moment, I’m using Fedora.
Resume.about-3: I’m currently studying AWS Cloud and Software Architecture.
Resume.job3-clarification: My love for the field led me to create and develop CarreraIT, a platform for people from Hispanic countries who want to work in tech or who already do. It provides surveys to receive feedback on career development, free resources, and orientation guides.
Resume.job3-responsibility-1: Developing the platform using Next.js, TypeScript, React.js, and Tailwind CSS, adhering to SOLID principles and focusing on building a maintainable architecture.
Resume.job3-responsibility-3: Writing orientation guides and creating surveys.
Resume.job3-responsibility-4: Searching and incorporating high-quality, free resources.
Resume.job2-responsibility-1: Participate in developing an AI platform using PHP, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
Resume.job2-responsibility-2: Create and manage tickets to organize my work using Trello and follow Scrum and Agile methodologies.
Resume.job2-responsibility-3: Writing documentation on best development practices to ensure high-quality code, and maintaining documentation for existing projects to help new developers adapt quickly and understand the reasoning behind the implementation.
Resume.job1-responsibility-1: Participate in front-end development using Vite, TypeScript, JavaScript, and Tailwind CSS following the SOLID principles.
Resume.job1-responsibility-2: Backend development using Nest.js, Docker, TypeORM, MySQL and SQLite in training projects.
Resume.job1-responsibility-3: Testing with Cypress and Jest to ensure the quality and functionality of web applications.
Resume.job1-responsibility-4: Create and manage tickets to organize my work using ClickUp and follow Scrum and Agile methodologies

Projects.project1-description: Web platform for people interested or working in IT.
Projects.project1-technologies: Next.js, TypeScript, React.js, Tailwind CSS, Vercel
Projects.project2-description: Task management app with CRUD functions and input validation.
Projects.project2-technologies: Python, Flask, SQLite, HTML, Tailwind CSS
Projects.project3-description: Website for using the Drake Equation to calculate life probabilities.
Projects.project4-description: Simple drag & drop, with a modern iOS appearance.
Projects.project5-description: Landing page where users can explore a selection of movies.
